Package pamViewFX.fxNodes.internalNode

Class PamInternalPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.Group
pamViewFX.fxNodes.internalNode.PamInternalPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PamInternalPane extends javafx.scene.Group
A PamInternalNode is a resizable node which can be resized within another node.
Author:
Jamie Macaulay

  • Constructor Details

    • PamInternalPane

      public PamInternalPane(javafx.scene.layout.Region mainPane, javafx.scene.layout.Region holderPane)
      Create a new internal pane.
      Parameters:
      mainPane - - the pane to display and allow resizing.

  • Method Details

    • showResizeControls

      public void showResizeControls(boolean editable)
      Add or remove the resizing nodes
      Parameters:
      editable - - true to add resize controls, false to remove resize controls.

    • setResizable

      public void setResizable(boolean resizable)
      Set whether the internal pane can be resized or not. If not then the pane can be draged if resize nodes are added but not resized.
      Parameters:
      resizable - -true to allow the pane to be resized and dragged. False to only allow the pane to be dragged.

    • isResizable

      public boolean isResizable()
      Check whether the internal pane can be resized or not. If not then the pane can be draged if resize nodes are added but not resized.
      Overrides:
      isResizable in class javafx.scene.Node
      Returns:
      true if the internal pane is allowed to be resized and dragged. False if the pane is only allowed to be dragged.

    • createResizeDragNodes

      public javafx.scene.Group createResizeDragNodes()
      Create nodes which resize, drag, flip and decorate the pane.
      Returns:
      Group of nodes to resize the pane.

    • setPaneSize

      public void setPaneSize(double x, double y)

    • setPaneLayout

      public void setPaneLayout(double x, double y)

    • getInternalRegion

      public javafx.scene.layout.Region getInternalRegion()
      Get the pane which is to be resized, the internal pane.
      Returns:
      the resizable region.

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation(double x, double y)
      Set location of the internal pane within its holder.
      Parameters:
      x - x pixel position within holder
      y - y pixel location within holder.

    • setSize

      public void setSize(double w, double h)
      Set size of the internal pane within its holder.
      Parameters:
      w - - width to set the pane to.
      h - - height to set pane to.
